item.title: 监管机构称比亚迪将在中国产品召回中修复 16,666 辆海鸥电动车的软件问题
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周二表示，比亚迪将从5月20日起修复16,666辆海鸥牌电动车的软件，以降低事故发生几率。【原文：BYD will fix software in 16,666 Seagull electric vehicles from May 20 to reduce the chance of accidents, China's market regulator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧元区经济衰退后第一季度增长超预期
item.description: 欧洲统计局（Eurostat）周二公布的初步数据显示，受德国经济恢复增长和西班牙经济强劲扩张的提振，欧元区2024年第一季度的经济增长超过预期。【原文：The euro zone economy grew by more than expected in the first quarter of 2024, buoyed by a return to growth for Germany and strong expansion in Spain, preliminary data from the European statistics agency Eurostat showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 疫情过后，香港企业纷纷停业，努力恢复生机
item.description: 十多年前，当 48 岁的 Jacky Yu 在香港开设他的日本礼品店时，旺角的旅游和购物区还是一个熙熙攘攘的中心，到处都是摊位、街头小吃和游客。【原文：When Jacky Yu, 48, opened his Japanese gift shop in Hong Kong more than a decade ago, the tourist and shopping district of Mong Kok was a bustling hub packed with stalls, street food and tourists.】

item.title: 转向新车型、需求疲软打击欧洲汽车制造商
item.description: 本周二，大众汽车、梅赛德斯-奔驰和斯泰伦特公司都公布了销量和第一季度收入下降，原因是它们都在为推出新车型做准备，而且由于利率居高不下，消费者对新车的需求减弱。【原文：Volkswagen , Mercedes-Benz and Stellantis all posted lower sales and first-quarter revenue on Tuesday as they geared up to launch new models and faced weaker consumer demand for new cars as interest rates remain high.】

item.title: 德国经济避开衰退
item.description: 今年年初，由于建筑业投资和出口的拉动，德国经济略有增长，但增长幅度超过预期，避免了经济衰退。【原文：The German economy skirted a recession at the start of the year, growing modestly but more than expected thanks to investment in construction and exports.】

item.title: 在必和必拓权衡对盎格鲁集团的坚定收购之际，投资者担心会出现 "偷梁换柱 "的情况
item.description: 英美资源集团的投资者告诉路透社，必和必拓集团不能在不支付高额溢价的情况下挑选英美资源集团的资产，他们担心持有南非子公司的股份会让他们损失惨重。【原文：BHP Group can't cherry pick Anglo American assets without paying a hefty premium, Anglo investors told Reuters, concerned that they stand to lose heavily by holding shares in South African subsidiaries.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金支持百事公司生物多样性风险评估竞标
item.description: 挪威主权财富基金计划支持一项股东提案，要求百事公司进行生物多样性风险评估，以衡量这家软饮料和零食巨头的业务对生物多样性丧失的脆弱性。【原文：Norway's sovereign wealth fund plans to back a shareholder proposal demanding PepsiCo conduct a biodiversity risk assessment to gauge how vulnerable the soft drink and snacks giant's operations are to biodiversity loss.】

item.title: 欧洲股市在通胀数据公布前的盈利潮中表现低迷
item.description: 周二，欧洲股市开盘后表现低迷，投资者在关注欧元区4月份通胀等经济数据的同时，也在分析各行业重量级企业的大量财报。【原文：European shares opened trade on a subdued note on Tuesday, as investors parsed a deluge of corporate earnings reports from industry heavyweights while keeping an eye out for economic data including the euro zone's inflation for April.】

item.title: 尽管涡扇发动机面临困境，但欧洲战斗机订单使 MTU 航空发动机公司第一季度利润上升
item.description: 德国发动机制造商MTU航空发动机公司周二公布的第一季度财报显示，受欧洲联合欧洲战斗机项目订单的推动，该公司第一季度盈利增加，同时其涡扇发动机召回活动仍在按计划进行。【原文：German engine manufacturer MTU Aero Engines reported higher first-quarter earnings on Tuesday, boosted by orders from the joint European Eurofighter jet project while its turbofan engines recall campaign remained on track.】

item.title: 阿尔诺-拉加代尔因法院起诉辞去行政职务
item.description: 法国拉加代尔公司（Lagardere SA）董事长兼首席执行官阿尔诺-拉加代尔（Arnaud Lagardere）周二表示，由于早前被法院起诉，他将不得不辞去高管职务，并将就此提出上诉。【原文：Arnaud Lagardere, the chairman and CEO of French company Lagardere SA , will have to resign from his executive roles as a result of an earlier court indictment against which he will appeal, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 卫星公司 SES 将以 31 亿美元收购 Intelsat
item.description: 卫星公司 SES 周二表示，已同意以约 31 亿美元的价格收购 Intelsat Holdings 的全部股份，这笔交易将打造一个欧洲行业巨头。【原文：Satellite company SES has agreed to buy all the shares of Intelsat Holdings for about $3.1 billion in a deal that would create a European giant in the industry, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 受罢工影响的三家 Stellantis 工厂将于五月初重启生产
item.description: Stellantis发言人周二表示，在找到替代零部件采购方案后，Stellantis在欧洲的三家装配厂将于5月初重新开始生产。【原文：Production at three Stellantis assembly plants in Europe will restart in the first days of May, a spokesman said on Tuesday, after the automaker found alternative solutions for the sourcing of parts.】

item.title: 法航荷航第一季度业绩逊于预期，成本飙升
item.description: 法航荷航集团周二报告称，由于面临荷兰航空公司荷航高额的客户赔偿和一次性支付给员工的费用，第一季度运营亏损达 4.89 亿欧元（5.2431 亿美元），高于预期。【原文：Airline group Air France-KLM on Tuesday reported a higher than expected first quarter operating loss of 489 million euros ($524.31 million) as it faced high customer compensation at Dutch carrier KLM and one-off payments to staff.】

item.title: 谢里夫总理表示，国际货币基金组织（IMF）的 11 亿美元贷款将有助于巴基斯坦的经济稳定
item.description: 巴基斯坦总理谢赫巴兹-谢里夫（Shehbaz Sharif）周二在讨论新的贷款计划时表示，国际货币基金组织（IMF）支付的 11 亿美元将帮助巴基斯坦实现更大的经济稳定。【原文：The disbursement of $1.1 billion by the International Monetary Fund (IMF) will help Pakistan achieve greater economic stability, Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif said on Tuesday, amid discussions for a new loan programme.】

item.title: 因产品组合转型，Stellantis 第一季度收入下降 12
item.description: Stellantis 周二表示，由于销量下降、不利的产品组合和外汇动态，该公司今年第一季度的收入下降了 12%，但 "坚挺的 "定价能力抵消了部分影响。【原文：Stellantis said on Tuesday its revenue fell 12% in the first quarter of the year on lower volumes, unfavourable product mix and foreign exchange dynamics, partially balanced by "firm" pricing power.】

item.title: 嘉士伯称提价为 2024 年开了个好头
item.description: 丹麦啤酒酿造商嘉士伯（Carlsberg）首席执行官周二表示，第一季度该公司在所有主要市场的价格都有所上涨，公司公布的季度销售额略高于预期。【原文：Danish brewer Carlsberg saw price increases in all its main markets during the first quarter, its CEO said on Tuesday as the company reported quarterly sales slightly above expectations.】

item.title: 日本央行对消费和服务价格前景持乐观态度
item.description: 日本央行表示，日本服务价格正在上涨，企业大幅加薪将在今年晚些时候提高家庭收入，这表明日本经济正朝着可持续实现2%的通胀目标迈进。【原文：Japanese service prices are rising and bumper pay hikes offered by firms will boost household income later this year, the Bank of Japan said, underscoring its conviction the economy is making progress towards sustainably achieving its 2% inflation target.】

item.title: 财政部长称乌干达将从伊斯兰开发银行获得 2.95 亿美元贷款
item.description: 乌干达财政部长周二表示，乌干达已与沙特阿拉伯伊斯兰开发银行（IDB）签署了一项2.95亿美元的贷款协议，用于资助道路建设和其他项目。【原文：Uganda has signed an agreement with Saudi Arabia's Islamic Development Bank (IDB) for a $295 million loan to fund road construction and other projects, the east African country's finance minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 法国第一季度经济略有增长
item.description: 法国统计局（INSEE）周二公布的初步数据显示，法国经济在第一季度略有增长，略高于分析师的预期。【原文：The French economy slightly grew in the first quarter, preliminary data from the INSEE statistics agency showed on Tuesday, a touch above analysts' expectations.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯第一季度业绩增长被北美销售额下滑部分抵消
item.description: 德国运动品牌阿迪达斯周二表示，除库存水平仍然较高的北美地区外，阿迪达斯在所有地区都取得了增长，这有助于其第一季度业绩的强劲增长。【原文：Adidas' strong first-quarter results were helped by growth across all regions, excluding North America, where inventory levels are still high, the German sportswear brand said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 第一季度利润下降后，梅赛德斯-奔驰誓言捍卫定价水平
item.description: 豪华汽车制造商梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）周二公布的第一季度利润和销量均低于预期，并表示将保持和捍卫第一季度的高定价水平。【原文：Luxury carmaker Mercedes-Benz on Tuesday reported lower first-quarter profits and sales that were in line with expectations, adding it would hold and defend high pricing levels seen in the first quarter.】

item.title: 德国沃诺维亚公司在业绩下滑中勉强恢复盈利
item.description: 德国最大的房地产集团 Vonovia 周二发布报告称，尽管德国房地产在数十年来最严重的危机中持续低迷，但该集团第一季度已恢复盈利。【原文：Vonovia , Germany's largest real estate group, on Tuesday reported that it returned to profit in the first quarter, even as the nation's property continues to writhe amid its worst crisis in decades.】

item.title: 特斯拉在中国的自动驾驶竞标面临竞争对手的竞相追赶
item.description: 如果特斯拉能成功地将其 "全自动驾驶 "系统引入中国这个全球最大的汽车市场，那么这家美国电动汽车先驱企业将在全球自动驾驶汽车竞赛中驶入快车道。【原文：If Tesla succeeds in bringing its "Full Self-Driving" system to China, the world's largest car market, the U.S. electric-car pioneer will be shifting into the fast lane of the global race toward autonomous vehicles.】

item.title: 聚焦：快时尚巨头 Shein 也想卖护肤品、牙膏和玩具
item.description: 在线快速时尚零售商Shein正在追求牙膏集团高露洁-棕榄公司和玩具制造商孩之宝公司等品牌，试图在其平台上销售更多家喻户晓的品牌。【原文：Online fast-fashion retailer Shein is courting brands like toothpaste conglomerate Colgate-Palmolive and toymaker Hasbro as it tries to sell more household names on its platform.】

item.title: 市场放缓，法国凯捷第一季度销售额下降
item.description: 法国 IT 咨询集团凯捷（Capgemini）周二报告称，第一季度收入低于去年同期，原因是市场预期放缓。【原文：French IT consulting group Capgemini reported lower first-quarter revenue on Tuesday, compared with the same period last year, citing an expected slowdown in the market.】

item.title: 加密世界TON 通过与 Telegram 合作起飞
item.description: 最近几个月，一种名为 TON 的硬币价值飙升，投资者押注它与信使服务 Telegram 的整合能将加密货币带给该应用的约 9 亿用户。【原文：A coin called TON has leapt in value in recent months, with investors betting its integration with messenger service Telegram could bring the cryptocurrency to the app's estimated 900 million users.】

item.title: 汉莎航空预测罢工后上半年将恢复盈利
item.description: 德国国旗航空公司汉莎航空周二表示，希望在今年下半年挽回与罢工有关的损失，并指出夏季旺季的预订量比上年增长了 16%。【原文：Lufthansa hopes to claw back its strike-related losses in the second half of the year, the German flag carrier said on Tuesday, pointing to a strong summer season with bookings up 16% on the previous year.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，特斯拉马斯克在更多裁员中裁减高级管理人员
item.description: 据 The Information 周二援引马斯克发给高级管理人员的一封电子邮件报道，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在精简公司的高级管理团队，并裁员数百人。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk is thinning the company's senior management team and laying off hundreds more employees, The Information reported on Tuesday, citing an email sent by Musk to senior executives.】

item.title: 欧洲零售业务稳健，桑坦德银行第一季度净利润增长 11
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Santander）周二表示，第一季度净利润同比增长 11%，原因是其稳健的欧洲零售业务受益于利率上升和多元化业务战略，从而实现了收入的稳步增长。【原文：Santander on Tuesday said its first-quarter net profit rose 11% year-on-year as its solid retail business in Europe benefited from higher interest rates and a diversified business strategy that allowed a steady revenues growth.】

item.title: 欧洲 日元波动，欧元区通胀岌岌可危
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee:】
